verses.verse: For <WG1063> as touching <WG4012> <WG3303> the <WG3588> ministering <WG1248> to <WG1519> the <WG3588> saints, <WG40> it is <WG2076> superfluous <WG4053> for me <WG3427> to write <WG1125> to you: <WG5213>

For <WG1063> I know <WG1492> the <WG3588> forwardness of your mind, <WG4288> <WG5216> for which <WG3739> I boast <WG2744> of <WG5228> you <WG5216> to them of Macedonia, <WG3110> that <WG3754> Achaia <WG882> was ready <WG3903> a year ago; <WG575> <WG4070> and <WG2532> <WG1537> your <WG5216> zeal <WG2205> hath provoked <WG2042> very many. <WG4119>

Yet <WG1161> have I sent <WG3992> the <WG3588> brethren, <WG80> lest <WG3363> our <WG2257> boasting <WG2745> of <WG5228> you <WG5216> should be in vain <WG2758> in <WG1722> this <WG5129> behalf; <WG3313> that, <WG2443> as <WG2531> I said, <WG3004> ye may be <WG5600> ready: <WG3903>

Lest haply <WG3381> if <WG1437> they of Macedonia <WG3110> come <WG2064> with <WG4862> me, <WG1698> and <WG2532> find <WG2147> you <WG5209> unprepared, <WG532> we <WG2249> (that <WG2443> we say <WG3004> not, <WG3361> ye) should be <WG5210> ashamed <WG2617> in <WG1722> this same <WG5026> confident <WG5287> boasting. <WG2746>

Therefore <WG3767> I thought <WG2233> it necessary <WG316> to exhort <WG3870> the <WG3588> brethren, <WG80> that <WG2443> they would go before <WG4281> unto <WG1519> you, <WG5209> and <WG2532> make up beforehand <WG4294> your <WG5216> bounty, <WG2129> whereof ye had notice before, <WG4293> that the same <WG5026> might be <WG1511> ready, <WG2092> <WG3779> as <WG5613> a matter of bounty, <WG2129> and <WG2532> not <WG3361> as <WG5618> of covetousness. <WG4124>

But <WG1161> this <WG5124> I say, He which soweth <WG4687> sparingly <WG5340> shall reap <WG2325> also <WG2532> sparingly; <WG5340> and <WG2532> he which soweth <WG4687> bountifully <WG1909> <WG2129> shall reap <WG2325> also <WG2532> bountifully. <WG1909> <WG2129>

Every man <WG1538> according as <WG2531> he purposeth <WG4255> in his heart, <WG2588> so let him give; not <WG3361> grudgingly, <WG1537> <WG3077> or <WG2228> of <WG1537> necessity: <WG318> for <WG1063> God <WG2316> loveth <WG25> a cheerful <WG2431> giver. <WG1395>

And <WG1161> God <WG2316> is able <WG1415> to make all grace abound <WG4052> <WG3956> <WG5485> toward <WG1519> you; <WG5209> that <WG2443> ye, always <WG3842> having <WG2192> all <WG3956> sufficiency <WG841> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> things, may abound <WG4052> to <WG1519> every <WG3956> good <WG18> work: <WG2041>

(As <WG2531> it is written, <WG1125> He hath dispersed abroad; <WG4650> he hath given <WG1325> to the <WG3588> poor: <WG3993> his <WG846> righteousness <WG1343> remaineth <WG3306> forever. <WG1519> <WG165>

Now <WG1161> he that ministereth <WG2023> seed <WG4690> to the <WG3588> sower <WG4687> both <WG2532> minister <WG5524> bread <WG740> for <WG1519> your food, <WG1035> and <WG2532> multiply <WG4129> your <WG5216> seed sown, <WG4703> and <WG2532> increase <WG837> the <WG3588> fruits <WG1081> of your <WG5216> righteousness;) <WG1343>

Being enriched <WG4148> in <WG1722> every thing <WG3956> to <WG1519> all <WG3956> bountifulness, <WG572> which <WG3748> causeth <WG2716> through <WG1223> us <WG2257> thanksgiving <WG2169> to God. <WG2316>

For <WG3754> the <WG3588> administration <WG1248> of this <WG5026> service <WG3009> not <WG3756> only <WG3440> supplieth <WG2076> <WG4322> the <WG3588> want <WG5303> of the <WG3588> saints, <WG40> but <WG235> is abundant <WG4052> also <WG2532> by <WG1223> many <WG4183> thanksgivings <WG2169> unto God; <WG2316>

While by <WG1223> the <WG3588> experiment <WG1382> of this <WG5026> ministration <WG1248> they glorify <WG1392> God <WG2316> for your <WG5216> professed <WG3671> subjection <WG5292> unto <WG1519> the <WG3588> gospel <WG2098> of Christ, <WG5547> and <WG2532> for your liberal <WG572> distribution <WG2842> unto <WG1519> them, <WG846> and <WG2532> unto <WG1519> all <WG3956> men;

And <WG2532> by their <WG846> prayer <WG1162> for <WG5228> you, <WG5216> which long after <WG1971> you <WG5209> for <WG1223> the <WG3588> exceeding <WG5235> grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> in <WG1909> you. <WG5213>
<WG1161> Thanks <WG5485> be unto God <WG2316> for <WG1909> his <WG846> unspeakable <WG411> gift. <WG1431>
